pkgmetadata.longdescription: Array Operations for Arrays of Mismatching Sizes // Support for implicit expansion of arrays in operations involving arrays of mismatching sizes. This pattern is known as "broadcasting" in 'Python' and "implicit expansion" in 'Matlab' and is explained for example in the article "Array programming with NumPy" by C. R. Harris et al. (2020) doi:10.1038/s41586-020-2649-2.
